Personalized Nutrition for Women

Nutrition that adapts to your body, your cycle, and your goals.

Key Features

AI Meal Logging

Log your meals in seconds with our advanced AI recognition technology.

Instant Feedback

Get real-time nutritional insights and feedback on every meal you log.

Cycle Syncing

Nutrition recommendations that adapt to each phase of your menstrual cycle.

How Moone Works

1

Log Your Meals

Take a photo of your meal and our AI instantly identifies ingredients and portions.

2

Get Insights

Receive immediate feedback on nutritional value and personalized recommendations.

3

Track Progress

Monitor your nutrition patterns and celebrate your consistency with weekly insights.

Eat in Sync with Your Cycle

Your nutritional needs change throughout your menstrual cycle. Moone adapts to each phase, providing tailored recommendations for:

  • Menstrual Phase
  • Follicular Phase
  • Ovulatory Phase
  • Luteal Phase

Meet our team

Moone is built by nutritionists and women, for women.

Dietitian-Nutritionist

Lea Thourain

Specializing in sports nutrition since 2019, Lea brings diverse experience from clinical settings to personalized coaching.

Follow on Instagram →
Founder

Kristelle Feghali

Driven by her own experience with endometriosis and a desire to challenge diet culture, Kristelle founded Moone to empower women.
